document.full_text: libyan government troops pounded the besieged rebel-held city of misrata overnight, undeterred by western threats to step up military action against muammar gaddafi's forces.
document.title: mortars pound misrata; west talks of tougher action
lines_and_colors: libyan government troops pounded the besieged rebel-held city of misrata overnight, undeterred by western threats to step up military action against muammar gaddafi's forces.
